Composition 
 
 • Upper: 100% polyester 
 • Insole: 85% polyester, 15% polyurethane 
 
 Specific care instructions 
 LEATHER: Clean with a clean, dry cloth. You can rub colourless or colour-matched waxes into the leather in a circular motion.
 
 SUEDE/NUBUCK/SPLIT SUEDE: Gently clean with a clean, dry cloth. You can also use a soft brush. Do not apply cream. Treat with special sprays.
 PATENT FINISH/SYNTHETIC FABRIC: Clean with a damp cloth.
 

Care
 • Do not wash 
 • Do not bleach 
 • Do not iron 
 • Do not dry clean 
 • Do not tumble dry
